item.title: MathJax Support
item.description: For enabling MathJax, add this to your content’s frontmatter: --- mathjax: true --- MathJax Syntax for Markdown In your Markdown content, use \\(…\\) delimiters for in-line mathematics. For mathematics blocks you can use either $$…$$ or \\[…\\] as delimiters.
